name: Heroic Age of Spaceflight: NASA... The 25th Year
overview: CDTV MULTIMEDIA HEROIC AGE OF SPACEFLIGHT NASA... The 25th Year Troika Multimedia is proud to present NASA... The 25th Year, the first in Troika's series of digital motion pictures on compact disc. NASA... The 25th Year is a 50-minute tribute to America's accomplishments in space...from the first Mercury flights to Neil Armstrong's "giant leap for mankind." Highlights include the Viking missions to Mars, in-depth coverage of the first Space Shuttle mission, extensive footage from NASA's flight testing and re- search programs, and a peek into our future in space. Adapted from a National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA) film, this Troika production uses Commodore's CD-XL format to produce a 1/4 screen, 10 frame per second digital motion picture in stereo sound. Join us and relive NASA's past triumphs while you discover the future of home entertainment-CDTV.
